data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Ball safe as Dortmund is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 3, Felix Zwayer signals a free kick to Dortmund in their own half.
Felix Zwayer signals a Schalke throw-in in Dortmund's half.
Throw-in for Schalke in the half of Dortmund.
In the minute 4, Can Schalke get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Dortmund's half?
Dortmund to take a throw-in in Schalke territory.
Throw-in for Schalke at Signal Iduna Park.
In the minute 7, Dortmund awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Schalke.
Felix Zwayer awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 9, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Mahmoud Dahoud (Dortmund) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Dortmund's Jadon Sancho breaks free at Signal Iduna Park. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 11, Felix Zwayer awards Schalke a goal kick.
In Dortmund Dortmund drive forward through Erling Haaland. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Free kick for Dortmund in their own half.
In the minute 13, Free kick Dortmund.
Omar Mascarell (Schalke) has received a first yellow card.
Dortmund have been awarded a corner by Felix Zwayer.
In the minute 16, Thomas Meunier for Dortmund drives towards goal at Signal Iduna Park. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Can Dortmund get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Schalke's half?
Dortmund awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 17, Free kick for Dortmund in their own half.
Dortmund's Raphael Guerreiro misses with an attempt on goal.
Schalke have a goal kick.
In the minute 18, Goal kick for Dortmund at Signal Iduna Park.
Throw-in for Dortmund in their own half.
Felix Zwayer signals a free kick to Dortmund in their own half.
In the minute 23, Schalke to take a throw-in in Dortmund territory.
Ball safe as Dortmund is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Felix Zwayer signals a free kick to Schalke.
In the minute 24, Felix Zwayer awards the home team a throw-in.
At Signal Iduna Park, Schalke are penalized for being offside.
Schalke's Goncalo Paciencia gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Dortmund defender.
In the minute 25, Corner awarded to Schalke.
Throw-in for Schalke in the half of Dortmund.
Throw-in for Dortmund at Signal Iduna Park.
In the minute 29, Erling Haaland for Dortmund gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Throw-in for Schalke in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 30, Felix Zwayer signals a Dortmund throw-in in Schalke's half.
Dortmund have been awarded a corner by Felix Zwayer.
Dortmund pushes forward through Mahmoud Dahoud, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 32, It's a goal kick for the away team in Dortmund.
Dortmund needs to be cautious. Schalke have an attacking throw-in.
Dortmund awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 33, Felix Zwayer signals a Dortmund throw-in in Schalke's half.
Schalke drive upfield and Bastian Oczipka gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Dortmund defender.
Throw-in for Schalke close to the penalty box.
In the minute 35, Corner awarded to Schalke.
Throw-in Dortmund.
Giovanni Reyna's header is off-target for Dortmund.
In the minute 37, Ball goes out of play for a Schalke goal kick.
Dortmund awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Dortmund in their own half.
In the minute 39, Schalke awarded a free kick in their own half.
Felix Zwayer awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Schalke in the half of Dortmund.
In the minute 41, Free kick for Dortmund in the half of Schalke.
Can Dortmund get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Schalke's half?
Throw-in for Schalke at Signal Iduna Park.
In the minute 43, It's a goal kick for the away team in Dortmund.
Dortmund to take a throw-in in Schalke territory.
Dortmund push forward at Signal Iduna Park and Giovanni Reyna gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Schalke defence.
In the minute 45, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
In the minute 46, Dortmund awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Felix Zwayer signals a Schalke throw-in in Dortmund's half.
Schalke to take a throw-in in Dortmund territory.
In the minute 47, Throw-in Dortmund.
Dortmund have a dangerous throw-in.
Important block from the Schalke defence as Jadon Sancho fires in a strike for Dortmund.
In the minute 51, Felix Zwayer signals a free kick to Schalke in their own half.
Ball safe as Dortmund is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Schalke drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 54, In Dortmund a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Dortmund have been awarded a corner by Felix Zwayer.
Raphael Guerreiro gets his shot on target but fails to score for Dortmund.
In the minute 55, Dortmund take a 1-0 lead thanks to Manuel Akanji.
Ahmed Kutucu is replacing Goncalo Paciencia for the away team.
The away team replace Nabil Bentaleb with Can Bozdogan.
In the minute 57, Schalke awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Dortmund a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Throw-in for Schalke in their own half.
In the minute 60, Ball goes out of play for a Dortmund goal kick.
Erling Haaland puts the ball in the net and the home team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 2-0.
Jadon Sancho instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 64, Felix Zwayer signals a throw-in for Dortmund, close to Schalke's area.
Dortmund's Erling Haaland gets in a shot on goal at Signal Iduna Park. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Dortmund.
In the minute 70, Giovanni Reyna (Dortmund) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Dortmund have been awarded a corner by Felix Zwayer.
Corner awarded to Dortmund.
In the minute 71, Free kick Dortmund.
Schalke make their third substitution with Benito Raman replacing Rabbi Matondo.
Axel Witsel is replacing Mahmoud Dahoud for Dortmund at Signal Iduna Park.
Felix Zwayer signals a free kick to Dortmund in their own half.
In the minute 72, Lucien Favre is making the team's second substitution at Signal Iduna Park with Felix Passlack replacing Giovanni Reyna.
Raphael Guerreiro (Dortmund) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
In the minute 73, Felix Zwayer awards Schalke a goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Schalke drive forward but Benito Raman is judged offside.
In the minute 76, Throw-in Schalke.
The home team have replaced Julian Brandt with Marco Reus. This is the third substitution made today by Lucien Favre.
Lucien Favre (Dortmund) is making a fourth substitution, with Thorgan Hazard replacing Jadon Sancho.
In the minute 78, Dortmund have been awarded a corner by Felix Zwayer.
Dortmund move into a more comfortable 3-0 lead. Mats Hummels is the scorer with a header!
Great play from Raphael Guerreiro to set up the goal.
In the minute 79, Throw-in for Schalke at Signal Iduna Park.
Ball safe as Schalke is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 80, Throw-in for Dortmund in the half of Schalke.
The home team have replaced Thomas Meunier with Mateu Morey. This is the fifth substitution made today by Lucien Favre.
Free kick for Schalke in their own half.
Schalke awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 82, Throw-in for Schalke in their own half.
Can Dortmund get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Schalke's half?
Schalke will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Dortmund.
In the minute 84, Felix Zwayer awards the away team a throw-in.
Can Dortmund get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Schalke's half?
Felix Zwayer signals a Dortmund throw-in in Schalke's half.
In the minute 85, Free kick for Schalke in their own half.
Schalke awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Felix Zwayer signals a free kick to Dortmund.
The match has come to a close in Dortmund. The final score is 3-0.
